verses.verse: פְּתַ֥ח <WH6605> Open לְבָנ֖וֹן <WH3844> O Lebanon דְּלָתֶ֑יךָ <WH1817> thy doors וְתֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> may devour אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> that the fire בַּאֲרָזֶֽיךָ׃ <WH730> thy cedars

הֵילֵ֤ל <WH3213> Howl בְּרוֹשׁ֙ <WH1265> fir tree כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָ֣פַל <WH5307> is fallen אֶ֔רֶז <WH730> for the cedar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Because אַדִּרִ֖ים <WH117> because the mighty שֻׁדָּ֑דוּ <WH7703> are spoiled הֵילִ֙ילוּ֙ <WH3213> howl אַלּוֹנֵ֣י <WH437> O ye oaks בָשָׁ֔ן <WH1316> of Bashan כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יָרַ֖ד <WH3381> is come down יַ֥עַר <WH3293> for the forest [הַבָּצוּר כ] (הַבָּצִֽיר׃ <WH1219> cut off ק)

ק֚וֹל <WH6963> [There is] a voice יִֽלְלַ֣ת <WH3215> of the howling הָרֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> of the shepherds כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֻׁדְּדָ֖ה <WH7703> is spoiled אַדַּרְתָּ֑ם <WH155> for their glory ק֚וֹל <WH6963> a voice שַׁאֲגַ֣ת <WH7581> of the roaring כְּפִירִ֔ים <WH3715> of young lions כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שֻׁדַּ֖ד <WH7703> is spoiled גְּא֥וֹן <WH1347> for the pride הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> of Jordan ס
כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> my God רְעֵ֖ה <WH7462> Feed אֶת־ <WH853> צֹ֥אן <WH6629> the flock הַהֲרֵגָֽה׃ <WH2028> of the slaughter

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who קֹנֵיהֶ֤ן <WH7069> Whose possessors יַֽהֲרְגֻן֙ <WH2026> slay וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no יֶאְשָׁ֔מוּ <WH816> them and hold themselves not guilty וּמֹכְרֵיהֶ֣ן <WH4376> and they that sell יֹאמַ֔ר <WH559> them say בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD וַאעְשִׁ֑ר <WH6238> for I am rich וְרֹ֣עֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7462> and their own shepherds לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יַחְמ֖וֹל <WH2550> pity עֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH5921> and

כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no אֶחְמ֥וֹל <WH2550> For I will no more pity ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer עַל־ <WH5921> on יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִ֜י <WH595> I מַמְצִ֣יא <WH4672> but lo I will deliver אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָדָ֗ם <WH120> the men אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> into his neighbour's וּבְיַ֣ד <WH3027> and into the hand מַלְכּ֔וֹ <WH4428> of his king וְכִתְּתוּ֙ <WH3807> and they shall smite אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> will no אַצִּ֖יל <WH5337> I will not deliver מִיָּדָֽם׃ <WH3027> and out of their hand

וָֽאֶרְעֶה֙ <WH7462> And I will feed אֶת־ <WH853> צֹ֣אן <WH6629> the flock הַֽהֲרֵגָ֔ה <WH2028> of slaughter לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> [even] you עֲנִיֵּ֣י <WH6041> O poor הַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> of the flock וָאֶקַּֽח־ <WH3947> And I took לִ֞י שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> unto me two מַקְל֗וֹת <WH4731> staves לְאַחַ֞ד <WH259> the one קָרָ֤אתִי <WH7121> I called נֹ֙עַם֙ <WH5278> Beauty וּלְאַחַד֙ <WH259> and the other קָרָ֣אתִי <WH7121> I called חֹֽבְלִ֔ים <WH2256> band וָאֶרְעֶ֖ה <WH7462> and I fed אֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּֽאן׃ <WH6629> the flock

וָאַכְחִ֛ד <WH3582> also I cut off אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> Three הָרֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> shepherds בְּיֶ֣רַח <WH3391> month אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> in one וַתִּקְצַ֤ר <WH7114> lothed נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> and my soul בָּהֶ֔ם וְגַם־ <WH1571> also נַפְשָׁ֖ם <WH5315> them and their soul בָּחֲלָ֥ה <WH973> also abhorred בִֽי׃

וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> Then said לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֶרְעֶ֖ה <WH7462> I I will not feed אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> הַמֵּתָ֣ה <WH4191> you that that dieth תָמ֗וּת <WH4191> let it die וְהַנִּכְחֶ֙דֶת֙ <WH3582> and that that is to be cut off תִּכָּחֵ֔ד <WH3582> let it be cut off וְהַ֨נִּשְׁאָר֔וֹת <WH7604> and let the rest תֹּאכַ֕לְנָה <WH398> eat אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> every one אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> the flesh רְעוּתָֽהּ׃ <WH7468> of another

וָאֶקַּ֤ח <WH3947> And I took אֶת־ <WH853> מַקְלִי֙ <WH4731> my staff אֶת־ <WH853> נֹ֔עַם <WH5278> [even] Beauty וָאֶגְדַּ֖ע <WH1438> and cut it asunder אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> לְהָפֵיר֙ <WH6565> that I might break אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֔י <WH1285> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֖תִּי <WH3772> which I had made אֶת־ <WH854> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> with all the people

וַתֻּפַ֖ר <WH6565> And it was broken בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> me וַיֵּדְע֨וּ <WH3045> upon me knew כֵ֜ן <WH3651> and thus עֲנִיֵּ֤י <WH6041> and so the poor הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> of the flock הַשֹּׁמְרִ֣ים <WH8104> that waited אֹתִ֔י <WH853> כִּ֥י <WH3588> for דְבַר־ <WH1697> that it [was] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> I

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> And I said אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to אִם־ <WH518> If ט֧וֹב <WH2896> good בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5869> unto them If ye think הָב֥וּ <WH3051> give שְׂכָרִ֖י <WH7939> [me] my price וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֣א ׀ <WH3808> not חֲדָ֑לוּ <WH2308> and if not forbear וַיִּשְׁקְל֥וּ <WH8254> So they weighed אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂכָרִ֖י <WH7939> for my price שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> thirty כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [pieces] of silver

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3069> God אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me הַשְׁלִיכֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7993> unto me Cast אֶל־ <WH413> to הַיּוֹצֵ֔ר <WH3335> it unto the potter אֶ֣דֶר <WH145> a goodly הַיְקָ֔ר <WH3366> price אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יָקַ֖רְתִּי <WH3365> that I was prised at מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> and וָֽאֶקְחָה֙ <WH3947> of them And I took שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> the thirty הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [pieces] of silver וָאַשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> and cast אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to הַיּוֹצֵֽר׃ <WH3335> them to the potter

וָֽאֶגְדַּע֙ <WH1438> Then I cut asunder אֶת־ <WH853> מַקְלִ֣י <WH4731> staff הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> mine other אֵ֖ת <WH853> הַחֹֽבְלִ֑ים <WH2256> band לְהָפֵר֙ <WH6565> that I might break אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאַחֲוָ֔ה <WH264> the brotherhood בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> between Judah וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> and Israel ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about ע֣וֹד <WH5750> again קַח־ <WH3947> unto me Take לְךָ֔ כְּלִ֖י <WH3627> unto thee yet the instruments רֹעֶ֥ה <WH7462> shepherd אֱוִלִֽי׃ <WH196> of a foolish

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִי֩ <WH595> I מֵקִ֨ים <WH6965> For lo I will raise up רֹעֶ֜ה <WH7462> a shepherd בָּאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> in the land הַנִּכְחָד֤וֹת <WH3582> those that be cut off לֹֽא־ <WH3808> who will not יִפְקֹד֙ <WH6485> [which] shall not visit הַנַּ֣עַר <WH5288> babe לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <WH1245> neither shall seek וְהַנִּשְׁבֶּ֖רֶת <WH7665> that that is broken לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יְרַפֵּ֑א <WH7495> nor heal הַנִּצָּבָה֙ <WH5324> that that standeth לֹ֣א <WH3808> or יְכַלְכֵּ֔ל <WH3557> nor feed וּבְשַׂ֤ר <WH1320> the flesh הַבְּרִיאָה֙ <WH1277> of the fat יֹאכַ֔ל <WH398> still but he shall eat וּפַרְסֵיהֶ֖ן <WH6541> their claws יְפָרֵֽק׃ <WH6561> in pieces ס

ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Woe רֹעִ֤י <WH7473> shepherd הָֽאֱלִיל֙ <WH457> to the idol עֹזְבִ֣י <WH5800> that leaveth הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> the flock חֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> the sword עַל־ <WH5921> will be on זְרוֹע֖וֹ <WH2220> [shall be] upon his arm וְעַל־ <WH5921> and עֵ֣ין <WH5869> eye יְמִינ֑וֹ <WH3225> and upon his right זְרֹעוֹ֙ <WH2220> his arm יָב֣וֹשׁ <WH3001> shall be clean תִּיבָ֔שׁ <WH3001> dried up וְעֵ֥ין <WH5869> eye יְמִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> and his right כָּהֹ֥ה <WH3543> shall be utterly תִכְהֶֽה׃ <WH3543> darkened ס
